21.heading: Kreep, Jeremy.
21.title: Fang Fairy
21.author: written and illustrated by Andy J
notes: "Jeremy Kreep has a problem. Something snagged a baby tooth from beneath his brother's pillow and left a puddle of slime. Now Jeremy and his best friend Nessy go off to find the truth behind the tooth fairy. Is the creature just a silly superstition or a real-life collector of fangs?"

157.heading: Kreisberg, Andrew, 1971-
157.title: Batman : Dead to Rights
157.author: Andrew Kreisberg, writer ; Scott McDaniel, penciller ; Andy Owens, inker.
notes: "Originally published in single magazine from in Batman Confidential 22-25, 29, 30."

"Vigilante justice meets criminal justice on the steps of the Gotham Central Police Department just after Batman's first encounter with the Joker! When Batman turns the Joker over to police custody, his work is far from done. As the Joker continues his senseless killing spree while imprisoned, Batman quickly realizes that this psychotic freak is no ordinary laughing larcenist."

175.heading: Krekeler, Ken.
175.title: Dry Spell
175.author: written and illustrated by Ken Krekeler.
notes: Summary (from SkyRiver): Tom Ferris lives in a world of super-heroes: vibrant colors that streak across the sky, that hurl themselves over rooftops at night. They are commonplace. But Tom doesn't notice that world anymore, because his world is made up of spreadsheets, of phone bills, of software and coffee and button-down shirts. Long ago, Tom had been someone special. Today, Tom has become someone else. A respectable, quiet man with a decent job and a dead dream. But each night, he lies awake, wishing for the chance to do things differently, to be the man he really is. One day, Tom gets his wish. And the world will never forget him again!

176.heading: Krekeler, Ken.
176.title: Gifted
176.author: written and illustrated by Ken Krekeler; in association with Ronin Studios and Tool Publications.
notes: Summary (from SkyRiver): There has been a terrible murder in the city. An unsolved crime, violent and insane. Private Investigator Steven Richards has been asked to pick up where the police left off. But what he will discover in the clues of the past will lead him to an impossible future; a future of heroes and thieves, of a place where all the gifted go.
